name: Renaissance: Blacklist
description:
Renaissance: Blacklist is a game made in a week for the Olc Code Jam 2021.

Story:

It's 1980. Some dudes and their half human robots are on the blacklist and will soon cause the end of the world. You are a robot from the future programmed to kill all of them. Survive trough all the rooms and make your way to the boss. Can you beat it?

Gameplay:

Move - W, A, S, D or arrow keys

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

Reload - r

Reload Level - t

Pro tip: shoot enemy bullets in order to destroy them

Credits:

Programming - Stefanarctic

Graphics - Darius Dumitrescu (From Origins)

Sound not working, will fix after the voting period ends

P.S: If you can beat the bossfight send me a screenshot and I will play your game
